amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 115-152 to clarify duties of national governing bodies with respect to implementing procedures pertaining to interactions between young athletes and adults. Also, the amendment makes technical and conforming changes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (LA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Johnson (LA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (LA) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
